title: Despite pledge, BofA finances gun maker
text:
Despite pledge, BofA finances gun maker 1:29pm EDT - 01:35
Bank of America is preparing to provide critical financing to Remington Outdoor Co, which makes assault-type rifles, just weeks after the U.S. bank said it would stop financing “military-style” firearms for civilians.
Bank of America is preparing to provide critical financing to Remington Outdoor Co, which makes assault-type rifles, just weeks after the U.S. bank said it would stop financing “military-style” firearms for civilians. //reut.rs/2KIgDgm
